dt: {bc}a round or elongated missile (as of lead) to be fired from a firearm
{bc}something resembling a bullet (as in curved form)
{bc}a large dot placed in printed matter to call attention to a particular passage
{bc}a very fast and accurately thrown or hit object (such as a ball or puck)

et: Middle French {it}boulette{/it} small ball & {it}boulet{/it} missile, diminutives of {it}boule{/it} ball {ma}{mat|bowl|}{/ma}
shortdef: a round or elongated missile (as of lead) to be fired from a firearm; broadly : cartridge
something resembling a bullet (as in curved form)
a large dot placed in printed matter to call attention to a particular passage

dt.t: I was {it}sweating bullets{/it} while I waited to talk to my boss.

shortdef: to be very nervous or worried

dt: {bc}a substance or therapy capable of destroying pathogens (such as bacteria or cancer cells) or providing an effective remedy for a disease or condition without deleterious side effects
{bc}something providing an effective solution to a difficult or previously unsolvable problem

dt.t: a {it}magic bullet{/it} to stem voter apathy

shortdef: a substance or therapy capable of destroying pathogens (such as bacteria or cancer cells) or providing an effective remedy for a disease or condition without deleterious side effects
something providing an effective solution to a difficult or previously unsolvable problem

dt: {bc}something that acts as a magical weapon
{bc}one that instantly solves a long-standing problem

shortdef: something that acts as a magical weapon; especially : one that instantly solves a long-standing problem
